author: Justin Wise
title: More than 100 Boston-area hospital employees test positive for coronavirus
description: More than 100 hospital employees in Boston have tested positive for the novel coronavirus as the city's health system responds to the disease's outbreak.Massachusetts General Hospital, Brigham and Women's Hospital...
content:
More than 100 hospital employees in Boston have tested positive for the novel coronavirus as the city's health system responds to the disease's outbreak.
